member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.ValueWebSocketReceiveResult

summary.vsli:raw: Represents the result of performing a single <see cref="M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.ReceiveAsync(System.Memory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> operation on a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />.

member.summary: 表示对 执行单个 操作所得到的结果。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ValueWebSocketReceiveResult.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketMessageType,System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ValueWebSocketReceiveResult" /> struct. An instance of this struct represents the result of performing a single <c>ReceiveAsync</c> operation on a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />.

member.summary: 初始化 结构的新实例。 此结构的实例表示对 执行单个 ReceiveAsync 操作所得到的结果。

param.name: count
param.vsli:raw: The number of bytes that the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> received.

member.param: 收到的字节数。

param.name: messageType
param.vsli:raw: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the current message is a UTF-8 message or a binary message.

member.param: 枚举值之一，指示当前消息是 UTF-8 消息还是二进制消息。

param.name: endOfMessage
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the messsage has been received completely; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.param: ，指示已完整收到消息；否则为 。

member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket

summary.vsli:raw: The WebSocket class allows applications to send and receive data after the WebSocket upgrade has completed.

member.summary: 在 WebSocket 升级完成后， WebSocket 类允许应用程序发送并接收数据。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> class.

member.summary: 创建 类的实例。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.Abort

summary.vsli:raw: Aborts the WebSocket connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

member.summary: 中止 WebSocket 连接并取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CloseAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Closes the WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation using the close handshake defined in the WebSocket protocol specification section 7.

member.summary: 使用在 WebSocket 协议规范第 7 节中定义的关闭握手关闭作为异步操作的 WebSocket 连接。

param.name: closeStatus
param.vsli:raw: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

member.param: 指示关闭 WebSocket 连接的原因。

param.name: statusDescription
param.vsli:raw: Specifies a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

member.param: 指定一个可读的解释为连接关闭的原因。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

member.param: 标记可用于传播取消操作的通知。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CloseOutputAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Initiates or completes the close handshake defined in the WebSocket protocol specification section 7.

member.summary: 启动或完成 WebSocket 协议规范第 7 节中定义的关闭握手。

param.name: closeStatus
param.vsli:raw: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

member.param: 指示关闭 WebSocket 连接的原因。

param.name: statusDescription
param.vsli:raw: Allows applications to specify a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

member.param: 允许应用程序指定一个可读的解释为连接关闭的原因。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

member.param: 标记可用于传播取消操作的通知。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CloseStatus

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates the reason why the remote endpoint initiated the close handshake.

member.summary: 指示远程终结点初始关闭握手的原因。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CloseStatusDescription

summary.vsli:raw: Allows the remote endpoint to describe the reason why the connection was closed.

member.summary: 允许该远程终结点描述连接已关闭的原因。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CreateClientBuffer(System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.vsli:raw: Create client buffers to use with this <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> instance.

member.summary: 创建用于此 实例的客户端缓冲区。

param.name: receiveBufferSize
param.vsli:raw: The size, in bytes, of the client receive buffer.

member.param: 客户端接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

param.name: sendBufferSize
param.vsli:raw: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

member.param: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

returns.vsli:raw: An array with the client buffers.

member.returns: 一个包含客户端缓冲区的数组。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CreateClientWebSocket(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean,System.ArraySegment{System.Byte})

summary.vsli:raw: Allows callers to create a client side WebSocket class which will use the WSPC for framing purposes.

member.summary: 允许调用方创建客户端 WebSocket 类，此类为组帧目的将使用 WSPC。

param.name: innerStream
param.vsli:raw: The connection to be used for IO operations.

member.param: 将用于 IO 操作的连接。

param.name: subProtocol
param.vsli:raw: The subprotocol accepted by the client.

member.param: 被客户端接受的子协议。

param.name: receiveBufferSize
param.vsli:raw: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket receive buffer.

member.param: 客户 WebSocket 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

param.name: sendBufferSize
param.vsli:raw: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket send buffer.

member.param: 客户端 WebSocket 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.vsli:raw: Determines how regularly a frame is sent over the connection as a keep-alive. Applies only when the connection is idle.

member.param: 确定帧是如何定期通过维弧连接发送的。 仅当连接空闲时应用。

param.name: useZeroMaskingKey
param.vsli:raw: Indicates whether a random key or a static key (just zeros) should be used for the WebSocket masking.

member.param: 指示随机键或静态键（仅指零）是否应针对 WebSocket 掩码而使用。

param.name: internalBuffer
param.vsli:raw: Will be used as the internal buffer in the WPC. The size has to be at least <c>2 * ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (16 on 32-bit)</c>.

member.param: 在 WPC 中将用作内部缓冲区。 大小必须至少为 2 * ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20（32 位上的 16）。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CreateFromStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.String,System.TimeSpan)

summary.vsli:raw: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> object that operates on the specified stream, which represents a web socket connection.

member.summary: 创建在指定流上操作的新 对象，它表示一个 Web 套接字连接。

param.name: stream
param.vsli:raw: The stream for the connection.

member.param: 连接的流。

param.name: isServer
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to indicate it's the server-side of the connection; <see langword="false" /> if it's the client-side.

member.param: 要指示它是连接的服务器端，则为 ；如果是客户端，则为 。

param.name: subProtocol
param.vsli:raw: The agreed upon sub-protocol that was used when creating the connection.

member.param: 创建连接时使用的已约定的子协议。

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.vsli:raw: The keep-alive interval to use, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan" /> to disable keep-alives.

member.param: 要使用的保持活动状态间隔，或禁用保持活动状态的 。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.CreateServerBuffer(System.Int32)

summary.vsli:raw: Creates a WebSocket server buffer.

member.summary: 创建 WebSocket 服务器缓冲区。

param.name: receiveBufferSize
param.vsli:raw: The size, in bytes, of the desired buffer.

member.param: 以字节为单位的所需的缓冲区的大小。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.DefaultKeepAliveInterval

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the default WebSocket protocol keep-alive interval.

member.summary: 获取默认 WebSocket 协议保持活动状态的间隔。

returns.vsli:raw: The default WebSocket protocol keep-alive interval. The typical value for this interval is 30 seconds (as defined by the OS or the .NET platform). It is used to initialize <see cref="P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocketOptions.KeepAliveInterval" /> value.

member.returns: 默认 WebSocket 协议保持活动状态的间隔。 此间隔的典型值为30秒 (如 OS 或 .NET 平台所定义)。 它用于初始化值。

summary.vsli:raw: Used to clean up unmanaged resources for ASP.NET and self-hosted implementations.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.IsStateTerminal(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState)

summary.vsli:raw: Returns a value that indicates if the state of the WebSocket instance is closed or aborted.

member.summary: 返回指示 WebSocket 实例的状态是“已关闭”还是“已中止”的值。

param.name: state
param.vsli:raw: The current state of the WebSocket.

member.param: WebSocket 的当前状态。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> is closed or aborted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果 已关闭或已中止，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket.ReceiveAsync(System.ArraySegment{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Receives data from the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> connection asynchronously.

member.summary: 从 连接异步接收数据。

param.name: buffer
param.vsli:raw: References the application buffer that is the storage location for the received data.

member.param: 引用应用程序缓冲区，其为已接收数据的存储位置。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: Propagates the notification that operations should be canceled.

member.param: 传播有关应取消操作的通知。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation. The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult" /> object that represents the received data.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。 任务对象上的 属性将返回包含已接收数据的 数组。

param.name: buffer
param.vsli:raw: The application buffer that is the storage location for the received data.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: The cancellation token to use to cancel the receive operation.

param.vsli:raw: Indicates whether the data in "buffer" is the last part of a message.

param.vsli:raw: The token that propagates the notification that operations should be canceled.

member.param: 传播有关应取消操作的通知的标记。

param.vsli:raw: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the application is sending a binary or text message.

param.name: state

param.vsli:raw: List of valid connection states.

member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus

summary.vsli:raw: Represents well known WebSocket close codes as defined in section 11.7 of the WebSocket protocol spec.

member.summary: 表示在 WebSocket 协议规范的第 11.7 节中定义的常见 WebSocket 关闭代码。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.Empty

summary.vsli:raw: No error specified.

member.summary: 未指定错误。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.EndpointUnavailable

summary.vsli:raw: (1001) Indicates an endpoint is being removed. Either the server or client will become unavailable.

member.summary: （1001）表示终结点正被移除。 无法连接到服务器或客户端。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.InternalServerError

summary.vsli:raw: (1011) The connection will be closed by the server because of an error on the server.

member.summary: 由于服务器的错误，连接将由服务器关闭。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.InvalidMessageType

summary.vsli:raw: (1003) The client or server is terminating the connection because it cannot accept the data type it received.

member.summary: （1003）因为无法接受已接收到的数据类型，客户端或服务器将停止连接。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.InvalidPayloadData

summary.vsli:raw: (1007) The client or server is terminating the connection because it has received data inconsistent with the message type.

member.summary: （1007）因为已接收到的数据类型与该消息类型不一致，客户端或服务器将停止连接。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.MandatoryExtension

summary.vsli:raw: (1010) The client is terminating the connection because it expected the server to negotiate an extension.

member.summary: （1010）因为服务器应协调扩展，客户端将停止连接。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.MessageTooBig

summary.vsli:raw: (1009) The client or server is terminating the connection because it has received a message that is too big for it to process.

member.summary: (1004)保留供将来使用。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.NormalClosure

summary.vsli:raw: (1000) The connection has closed after the request was fulfilled.

member.summary: （1000） 该请求中履行之后，该连接关闭。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.PolicyViolation

summary.vsli:raw: (1008) The connection will be closed because an endpoint has received a message that violates its policy.

member.summary: （1008）因为终结点接收了违反其策略的消息，连接将关闭。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus.ProtocolError

summary.vsli:raw: (1002) The client or server is terminating the connection because of a protocol error.

member.summary: （1002）由于协议错误，客户端或服务器将停止该连接。

summary.vsli:raw: The cookies that were passed to the server during the opening handshake.

summary.vsli:raw: The HTTP headers that were sent to the server during the opening handshake.

member.summary: 在打开握手期间，被发送到服务器的 HTTP 标题。

summary.vsli:raw: Whether the WebSocket client is authenticated.

member.summary: 不否对 WebSocket 客户端进行身份验证。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.IsLocal

summary.vsli:raw: Whether the WebSocket client connected from the local machine.

member.summary: WebSocket 客户端是否从本地计算进行连接。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.IsSecureConnection

summary.vsli:raw: Whether the WebSocket connection is secured using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

member.summary: 是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 保护 WebSocket 连接。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.Origin

summary.vsli:raw: The value of the Origin HTTP header included in the opening handshake.

member.summary: 包括打开握手 Origin HTTP 标题的值。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.RequestUri

summary.vsli:raw: The URI requested by the WebSocket client.

member.summary: WebSocket 客户端请求的 URI。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.SecWebSocketKey

summary.vsli:raw: The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the opening handshake.

member.summary: 包括在打开握手中 SecWebSocketKey HTTP 标题的值。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.SecWebSocketProtocols

summary.vsli:raw: The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the opening handshake.

member.summary: 包括在打开握手中 SecWebSocketKey HTTP 标题的值。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext.SecWebSocketVersion

summary.vsli:raw: The list of subprotocols requested by the WebSocket client.

member.summary: 由 WebSocket 客户请求的子协议列表。

summary.vsli:raw: An object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.

member.summary: 用于获取标识、身份验证信息和 WebSocket 客户的安全角色的对象。

summary.vsli:raw: The WebSocket instance used to interact (send/receive/close/etc) with the WebSocket connection.

member.summary: 用于与 WebSocket 交互（送信/受信/关闭/等）的 WebSocket 实例。

member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError

summary.vsli:raw: Contains the list of possible WebSocket errors.

member.summary: 包含可能的 WebSocket 错误列表。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.ConnectionClosedPrematurely

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that the connection was terminated unexpectedly.

member.summary: 指示连接意外终止。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.Faulted

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates a general error.

member.summary: 指示常规错误。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.HeaderError

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates an error occurred when parsing the HTTP headers during the opening handshake.

member.summary: 指示在打开握手时分析 HTTP 头时发生一个错误。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.InvalidMessageType

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that a WebSocket frame with an unknown opcode was received.

member.summary: 指示接收带有未知操作码的一个 WebSocket 帧。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.InvalidState

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates the WebSocket is an invalid state for the given operation (such as being closed or aborted).

member.summary: 指示 WebSocket 对于特定操作是无效状态(例如关闭或放弃)。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.NativeError

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that an unknown native error occurred.

member.summary: 指示发生未知本地错误。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.NotAWebSocket

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that the incoming request was not a valid websocket request.

member.summary: 指示传入请求不是一个合法的 websocket 请求。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.Success

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that there was no native error information for the exception.

member.summary: 指示异常不存在本地错误信息。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.UnsupportedProtocol

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that the client requested an unsupported WebSocket subprotocol.

member.summary: 指示该客户端请求一个不受支持的 WebSocket subprotocol。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError.UnsupportedVersion

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that the client requested an unsupported version of the WebSocket protocol.

member.summary: 指示客户端请求 WebSocket 协议的不受支持的版本。

member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException

summary.vsli:raw: Represents an exception that occurred when performing an operation on a WebSocket connection.

member.summary: 表示异常，其在 WebSocket 连接上执行操作时发生。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.

member.summary: 创建 类的实例。

summary.vsli:raw: The message is in binary format.

summary.vsli:raw: A receive has completed because a close message was received.

summary.vsli:raw: The message is clear text.

member.summary: 该消息是明文形式。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult.CloseStatus

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates the reason why the remote endpoint initiated the close handshake.

member.summary: 指示远程终结点启动关闭握手的原因。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult.CloseStatusDescription

summary.vsli:raw: Returns the optional description that describes why the close handshake has been initiated by the remote endpoint.

member.summary: 返回描述关闭握手由远程终结点启动的原因的可选说明。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult.Count

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates the number of bytes that the WebSocket received.

member.summary: 指示 WebSocket 接收的字节数。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult.EndOfMessage

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates whether the message has been received completely.

member.summary: 指示是否已完整收到该消息。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketReceiveResult.MessageType

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates whether the current message is a UTF-8 message or a binary message.

member.summary: 指示当前消息是 UTF-8 消息还是二进制消息。

member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState

summary.vsli:raw: Defines the different states a WebSockets instance can be in.

member.summary: 定义 WebSockets 事例可能性的不同状态。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.Aborted

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates that the WebSocket has been aborted.

member.summary: 留待将来使用。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.Closed

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates the WebSocket close handshake completed gracefully.

member.summary: 指示正常完成 WebSocket 关闭握手。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.CloseReceived

summary.vsli:raw: A close message was received from the remote endpoint.

member.summary: 自该远程终结点接收的关闭消息。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.CloseSent

summary.vsli:raw: A close message was sent to the remote endpoint.

member.summary: 向远程终结点发送了关闭消息。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.Connecting

summary.vsli:raw: The connection is negotiating the handshake with the remote endpoint.

member.summary: 连接到远程终结点处的链接。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.None

summary.vsli:raw: Reserved for future use.

member.summary: 留待将来使用。

member.name: F:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState.Open

summary.vsli:raw: The initial state after the HTTP handshake has been completed.

member.summary: 在 HTTP 握手完成之后的初始状态。
